warn.title: Partial translation warning
warn.desc: We want to inform you that some sections of the website are not fully translated because certain data obtained from our API is in English. We recommend that you use your browser's translator for a better experience. Thank you for your understanding and patience, and we apologize for the circumstance.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found. Perhaps Rinako Bellerose is behind all this, who knows...
